June Esther Bacon-Bercey (née Griffin, Ọktoba 23, 1928 - Julaị 3, 2019) bụ ọkachamara mba America na ihu igwe na ụgbọ elu  onye rụrụ ọrụ maka National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, National Weather Service na Atomic Energy Commission
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ onye Afrịka America nwetara akara ugo mmụta na meteorology ma bụrụ nwanyị mbụ TV meteorologist zụrụ azụ na ngalaba meteorology na United States
A mụrụ Bacon-Bercey ma zụlite na Wichita, Kansas na afọ 1928
Nna ya bụ onye ọka iwu na nne ya bụ onye nkụzi egwu
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obere, ma nne ya lụgharịrị di na nwunye kwaga Florida, hapụ ya ka ọ bụrụ nne na nna ya zụrụ ya
Ọ bụ naanị ya bụ nwa nwere mmasị ịnya igwe kwụ otu ebe, ịga njem, ịkpọ piano, na isonye na mmemme Girl Scouts
A na-eto onye nkuzi physics ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị maka ịhụ mmasị Bacon-Bercey na nchụpụ mmiri na ịma mma na ịgba ya ume ịchụso ọrụ na meteorology
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum nkeonwe dị nso n'ụlọ n'ebumnobi ka ọ bụrụ isi na mgbakọ na mwepụ, mana ọ hapụrụ mahadum Friends mgbe afọ abụọ gachara ịga nweta akara ugo mmụta na meteorology
Ọ gara wee nweta nzere bachelọ na 1954 na Mahadum California, Los Angeles (UCLA), nke n'oge ahụ bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ ole na ole na mba ahụ nyere nzere afọ anọ na sayensị ikuku

O chere mmegide na nkụda mmụọ ihu n'ịchụso akara ugo mmụta meteorology ya, dị ka o kwuru n'oge a gbara ajụjụ ọnụ nke 1977 maka isiokwu Baltimore Sun, “Mgbe m họọrọ isi m, onye ndụmọdụ m, onye ka nọ na UCLA, dụrụ m ọdụ ka m banye na akụnụba ụlọ
Enwetara m D na akụnụba ụlọ yana A na thermodynamics
"   Bacon-Bercey ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ Afrịka America ka e nyere nzere meteorology site na UCLA
O nwetara Masters of Public Administration (MPA) site na Journalism School of University of Southern California na 1979

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ịse na itoolu, ọ nwetara nzere nkuzi ka o wee nwee ike ije ozi dị ka onye nkuzi enyemaka mpaghara maka ọmụmụ mgbakọ na mwepụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị elementrị na nke sekọndrị ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 80, yana ọrụ ikpeazụ ya na Westmoor High School na Daly City, California

N'oge na-adịghị anya ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ,na Bacon-Bercey kwagara Washington DC maka ọkwa dị ka onye nyocha ihu igwe na onye na-ahụ maka amụma na National Meteorological Center,    nke a maara ugbu a dị ka National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration's National Weather Service
Bacon-Bercey gara n'ihu n'ọrụ ya dị ka onye injinia, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Sperry Corporation,  wee rụọ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ gọọmenti etiti dị iche iche gụnyere United States Atomic Energy Commission
Ọ natara ọkwa dịka onye ndụmọdụ dị elu na Atomic Energy Commission na 1959 n'ihi mmasị ya ịghọta nke ọma mmetụta hydrogen na bọmbụ atọm na ikuku ụwa
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ọrụ a, ọ mụtara usoro mmebi nke mgbawa ngwa ngwa nuklia kpatara
N'afọ ndị 1960, Bacon-Bercey sonyeere NOAA na ụlọ ọrụ New York City dị ka onye na-ahụ maka meteorologist radar
N'afọ 1971, ọ sonyeere WGR-TV dị ka onye nta akụkọ akụkọ, na ọrụ ọ kpuchiri ọgba aghara Ụlọ mkpọrọ Attica
N'afọ 1972, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ahụ maka meteorologist n'ikuku mgbe e jidere onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe gara aga maka izu ohi ụlọ akụ
Ọ bụ ngwa gwa ghọrọ onye isi meteorologist ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ

Nke a Malite na 1979, Bacon-Bercey nọrọ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri dị ka onye isi nchịkwa maka Ọrụ Weather Television na National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) ma rụọ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Ịbawanye nsonye nke ụmụ nwanyị Africa-American na meteorology na sayensị geophysical bụ isi ihe na-elekwasị anya maka Bacon-Bercey
Na 1978, o bipụtara nyocha nke ndị ọkà mmụta meteorologists Africa-American na US
Ọ meriri $64,000 dị ka onye na-asọmpi na ajụjụ $128,000 na 1977, nke ọ na-eji guzobe ego mmụta maka ụmụ agbọghọ nwere mmasị na sayensị ikuku, nke American Geophysical Union (AGU) na-elekọta

Site na afọ 1978 ruo afọ 1990, ụmụ nwanyị 13 (ụmụ akwụkwọ 12 gụsịrị akwụkwọ, nwa akwụkwọ 1 na-agụghị akwụkwọ) nwetara $ 400- $ 500 nke ego mmụta sitere na AGU's June Bacon-Bercey Scholarship na Sayensị ikuku maka ụmụ nwanyị
Ọmụmụ ihe a na-amalitegharị na 2021
Bacon-Bercey jere ozi na kọmitii AGU na ụmụ nwanyị na ndị pere mpe na sayensị ikuku, wee rụkọọ aka na Board American Meteorological Society's Board on Women and Minorities
Warren M
Washington bụ onye ọzọ tọrọ ntọala nke AWS Board on Women and Minorities
Na mgbakwunye, ọ jere ozi na bọọdụ ndị isi nke otu mba nke mmepe ọkachamara ojii
Na afọ 2006, Bacon-Bercey pụtara n'akwụkwọ maka ndị na-eto eto, June Bacon-Bercey: meteorologist na-ekwu banyere ihu igwe

Bacon-Bercey bụ nwanyị mbụ, yana onye America-America mbụ, nke a ga-enye ndị American Meteorological Society 's Seal of Approval maka ọkaibe na ihu igwe telivishọn mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na WGR na Buffalo, New York na mgbe afọ 1970s

Na afọ 2000, a kwanyere ya ugwu n'oge ogbako ụbọchị atọ na Mahadum Howard maka onyinye ya gụnyere: inyere aka guzobe ụlọ nyocha meteorology na Mahadum Jackson State na Mississippi, onyinye ya nke scholarships, na ọrụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze California
Akpọkwara Bacon-Bercey onye ọsụ ụzọ pere mpe maka mmezu na sayensị ikuku site n'aka NASA
Bacon-Bercey lụrụ Walker Bacon Jr., John Bercey na George Brewer ugboro atọ
Ọ mụrụ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Dawn-Marie na Dail
Bacon-Bercey nwụrụ n'okpuru nlekọta ụlọ ọgwụ na Burlingame, California site na dementia frontotemporal na July 3, 2019 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu
A mara ọkwa ọnwụ ya ka ọnwa isii gachara
